termsOfService.description: RubyKaigi 2022 Schedule.select powered by SmartHR wants you to accept Terms of Service in order for you to create your own schedule. You won’t see this message when you add talks to your schedule again.

errors.timeOverlapError: Can't select [{{left}}] and [{{right}}] at the same time, they are overlapping time schedule.
errors.notFound: 404! The contents you are looking for is not found.
errors.notFoundDesc: Why don’t you go to Talks and make your own schedule?

application.intro:
"RubyKaigi 2022 Schedule.select" is RubyKaigi's official schedule creation and sharing app. You can list the sessions you are interested in and create your own viewing schedule!
If you have ever wondered, "Which session should I watch…" before attending a conference, then this is the app for you.
We developed this app so participants could share their "viewing schedules" and "reasons for interest" before the event, which they could use as a reference for session selection and to enjoy the conference even more.
Why do you want to see the session? Share it before the event and let's enjoy RubyKaigi 2022 together!
